attributes.action: Seek to agree a comprehensive international peace plan for the Middle East
attributes.additional_details: The Middle East is a very important part of the world and many countries appear to be at the point of collapse, be it because of conflict, disagreements, wars etc. Rather than improving over time the situation appears to be worsening and there is an existential threat to many. We want the UK to work with representatives of all groups and the UN to get agreement on how peace and prosperity can be secured for the region.
attributes.background: Seek to agree a comprehensive international peace plan for the Middle East to include all groups engaged in conflict in the Middle East, such that hopefully it will lead to a Permanent Ceasefire and an agreed way forward which gives equity, justice and peace for all in the Middle East.

signatures_by_constituency.mp: Rt Hon Suella Braverman KC MP
signatures_by_constituency.name: Fareham

signatures_by_constituency.mp: Rt Hon Sir Oliver Heald KC MP
signatures_by_constituency.name: North East Hertfordshire
